# suspending

**Type Property**

A clock that measures time that always increments but stops incrementing while the system is asleep.

## Declaration

```swift
static var suspending: SuspendingClock { get }
```

## Discussion

```swift
  try await Task.sleep(until: .now + .seconds(3), clock: .suspending)
```
